Tms module¶

class Tms.Tms(backlog_manager, interface)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Ticket Management System class.

This class handles various operations related to ticket management.

backlog_manager¶

The object managing the backlog.

interface¶

The interface object for user interaction.

assign_ticket(case_id, case_assign, state)[source]¶

Assigns the specified ticket to an assignee.

Parameters:

  • case_id (str) – The ID of the ticket.

  • case_assign (str) – The assignee of the ticket.

  • state (str) – The state of the ticket.

Returns:

True if the ticket was successfully assigned, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

close_ticket(case_id)[source]¶

Closes the specified ticket.

Parameters:

case_id (str) – The ID of the ticket to close.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the closed ticket.

Return type:

dict

create_ticket(id, name, description, type)[source]¶

Creates a new ticket.

Parameters:

  • id (str) – The ID of the ticket.

  • name (str) – The name of the ticket.

  • description (str) – The description of the ticket.

  • type (str) – The type of the ticket.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the created ticket.

Return type:

dict

get_closed_tickets_between_days()[source]¶

Retrieves statistics about closed tickets.

get_old_open_tickets()[source]¶

Retrieves tickets that are opened for 3-10-20 days.

print_one_ticket(case_id)[source]¶

Prints information about the specified ticket.

Parameters:

case_id (str) – The ID of the ticket to print.

Returns:

True if the ticket was found and printed, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

run()[source]¶

Runs the Ticket Management System.

This method continuously prompts the user for input and performs actions based on the chosen option.

search_tickets(keyword)[source]¶

Searches for tickets based on the provided keyword.

Parameters:

keyword (str) – The keyword to search for.

Returns:

True if at least one ticket matching the keyword was found, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
